localize.text: It seems you have decided to move forward.
Your body and mind are weathered. Where does your confidence come from?
Anyway, you must have some questions.
Such as, “Who is this old man that has familiar voice and face?”
You cannot look at yourself.
Think of me as, a mirror of you.
A shattered mirror, to be precise.
This old man is one of the pieces of the mirror, namely Abel.
Filled with rage and obstinacy, waiting to be miserably forgotten.
I, just like you, decided to proceed but nothing changed.
I had trouble sleeping, and rare moments I could sleep were riddled with nightmares.
We are the first men to access the well of humanity.
We have been existed from long time ago, but we are forgotten and denied. Now, only few can feel us.
Just a handful of people.
Only Carmen was completely sure about our existence and tried to persuade us.
If our existence is proven, that will mean that she will have access to the well.
She believed that the cure to the world’s disease is related to the well.
The research we conducted, took from where Carmen left, was successful.
We found a method to siphon the primordial sea which had every possibility of humanity’s past, present, and future.
If everyone had a bucket, they would draw their own water from their own well.
It is fascinating.
We were secretly arrogant.
We thought we could rekindle the long-forgotten flame and water of life.
However, the path we walked was not different from that of Prometheus.
What have we accomplished, after all?
We lost much more than we gained.
You did not see
how our friend Benjamin met his demise.
He was one of few who could tolerate your ill-temper.
But you did not see how he died.
Fortunately, we have a recording here. Would you like to listen?
Now it's the final truth.
It’s something you must learn.
I understand that truth hurts.
It’s hard for me as well.
It’s like building a sand castle for years only to destroy it later.
It’s beyond agony, denying the efforts in the past.
But I want to make things right, whatever the cost.
The final truth is...
“You will repeat the cycle of infinity. Oblivious to everything that transpired.”
“Leave, before you can’t undo everything.”
That’s what you wanted to say.
I’m sorry that we have to meet like this again.
It did not take long to find out where you are.
I thought I should give you some time to say goodbye, since this will be the last time to say that to the manager who you looked up to.
Angela…
I feel like I became an unfortunate damsel in a play whenever you call my name.
It might sound like an excuse, but please know this.
I am not doing this because of my personal feelings.
Everything is by the first order.
The absolute order that dictate us not to mess up the script.
....Are you okay doing this?
I know you well, not just because I’m one of the people who created you.
I know you’re different from other machines.
I knew from the start, too.
That you’re too valuable to be hiding in such place like this.
Our conversation is being recorded, and I have no obligation to answer your questions.
Don’t fear, Benjamin.
Everyone you missed is waiting for you.
You will be with them forever.
You are the last actor who will lead this play to its finale.
Bitter, is it not?
Benjamin was hiding here long time ago.
When TT2 Protocol was activated, a brief moment became an eternity and overwhelmed Benjamin here.
I assume that he tried to run away with us.
But as you already know, he failed.
Perhaps you don’t feel guilty because you gave him another life?
Think however you want. Find solace in your mind or you will not endure this place.
Brain is one of the vital organs of human body.
Hundreds of billions of neural cells stretch like branches of trees and form a forest.
This forest, as long as the original exists, can be replaced.
Those who perished were woken in machine bodies.
It was your plan, but you couldn’t do it alone.
But.
I have already seen the world ahead of you. The time that you have not seen yet.
Nothing changes.
Benjamin, your friends, the employees…. their sacrifices mean nothing.
You saw how they’ve met their ends.
You realized how innocent, talented souls of young men were trapped in machines.
We failed them. The world has forgotten us.
Who will compensate for their sacrifice, then?
Do you know what we forgot?
I was not perfect, manager.
I was always ahead of myself. I was not being realistic.
This is a sad place.
So, I refused to think I can’t do something.
But you saw.
This obsession just ate me away.
What’s important was to stand with my own legs.
To know where I am, where I should go.
Then it naturally comes.
The will inside me.
Will To Stand Up Straight
Even if you stand straight, what’s around you is nothing but despair.
You may seem noble, but you were sailing through the dead sea inside of you.
Emotional thoughts only depressed us. It did not help anything.
We needed to be more rational.
This fake rationality crumbled me, you, all of us.
We have walked too far to talk such melancholy stories.
We thought relying on emotions help nothing.
But accepting sadness was important.
Fake rationality only made our hearts rot.
It is hard at first. You will feel like you will crumble.
But it will get better. I am sure of it.
Distinctive Reasoning
It’s too late to settle down our hearts.
Your mind is empty and lacks purpose.
The people I’ve lost whispered in my ears whenever I close my eyes…
They said if I really think it’s going to get better.
I couldn’t say anything.
Do you think you’ll be any different?
You see, manager. You should not look at past in times like that.
I know my sins can’t be forgiven no matter what I do.
That’s why I was so ahead of myself.
I won’t be from now on.
I will become a better person if I continue.
Let’s live with such hope in our mind.
The Hope to be a Better Person
What’s good of all this?
How many times to I have to tell you? You have nothing left.
No matter how controlled you are, you are losing the meaning of life since Carmen left.
Why are you obsessed with life that has no meaning?
Look at me. Look how I am continuing this meaningless life, waiting for death.
If you ask me what’s the reason to live this painful life,
I don’t know yet.
You woke me up,
but I guess it’s my responsibility to take care of anything what comes next.
I chose to be a bit more courageous.
It took me a great deal of courage,
to live onward with my life.
Just, live your life for once.
I did it. What makes you think you can’t?
Courageous Fortitude
We’ve been thinking for a long time.
None of the paths we thought to be the right answer was correct.
How can I not let you pass when you answer like this?
Nameless, being nameless is a great bless.
Name is a stigma that constantly reminds you that you’re on a wrong path.
The door you will face after leaving this place is named Trial.
It could be also called as Ordeal or Agony.
You seem to possess strength to overcome them.
A strength to choose different path, different future, different answer.
I will witness your strength.
I hope you prove it to this unbelieving old man.
Can’t you hear my voice anymore?
Please, answer me.
Those who cannot answer have no right to move forward.
I can’t open the door to someone who is not ready.
You must stop here.
and turn back.
It won’t be hard. Your steps will be light as you leave everything on you.
We shall meet here again, when you are ready.
I am not sure if it will come or not.
